com.licel.jcardsim.smartcardio

Class CardSimulator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.licel.jcardsim.base.Simulator
      • com.licel.jcardsim.io.JavaxSmartCardInterface
        • com.licel.jcardsim.smartcardio.CardSimulator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CardInterface, JavaCardInterface

    public class CardSimulator
extends JavaxSmartCardInterface
    Simulates a JavaCard.
    See Also:

      • assignToTerminal

        public void assignToTerminal(CardTerminal terminal)

        Assigns this simulated card to a CardTerminal.

        If the card is already assigned to another CardTerminal, it will be ejected and inserted into the CardTerminal terminal.

        Parameters:
        terminal - card terminal or null

      • getAssignedCardTerminal

        public CardTerminal getAssignedCardTerminal()
        Returns:
        the assigned CardTerminal or null if none is assigned
